verbose_text: Taken together, the present study demonstrated that EPO may have a critical role against MF by activating PI3K / Akt signaling and by down-regulating TLR4 expression, thereby inhibiting the release of TGF-beta1, TNF-alpha, IL-6, IL-1beta, IL-17A, MMP-9 and MMP-2.
evidence: TLR4 expression, thereby inhibiting the release of TGF-beta1, TNF-alpha, IL-6, IL-1beta
